query:
UPDATE blog_posts SET featuredImage = CASE slug
  WHEN 'hull-maritime-history' THEN '/images/hull_marina_waterfront.png'
  WHEN 'city-of-culture-legacy' THEN '/images/hull_culture_theatre.png'
  WHEN 'must-visit-attractions' THEN '/images/hero_the_deep.png'
  WHEN 'hull-best-restaurants' THEN '/images/hull_dining_restaurant.png'
  WHEN 'traditional-hull-cuisine' THEN '/images/hull_old_town.png'
  WHEN 'hull-coffee-culture' THEN '/images/hull_old_town.png'
  WHEN 'annual-events-calendar' THEN '/images/hull_events_festival.png'
  WHEN 'hull-arts-scene' THEN '/images/ferens_art_gallery.png'
  WHEN 'hull-fair-tradition' THEN '/images/hull_events_festival.png'
  WHEN 'hull-neighborhoods-guide' THEN '/images/hull_old_town.png'
  WHEN 'hidden-gems-locals-secrets' THEN '/images/streetlife_museum.png'
  WHEN 'living-like-local-hull' THEN '/images/hull_marina_waterfront.png'
  WHEN 'getting-around-hull' THEN '/images/humber_bridge_sunset.png'
  WHEN 'where-to-stay-hull' THEN '/images/hull_marina_waterfront.png'
  WHEN 'planning-perfect-hull-visit' THEN '/images/hero_the_deep.png'
  ELSE featuredImage
END
WHERE slug IN ('hull-maritime-history', 'city-of-culture-legacy', 'must-visit-attractions', 'hull-best-restaurants', 'traditional-hull-cuisine', 'hull-coffee-culture', 'annual-events-calendar', 'hull-arts-scene', 'hull-fair-tradition', 'hull-neighborhoods-guide', 'hidden-gems-locals-secrets', 'living-like-local-hull', 'getting-around-hull', 'where-to-stay-hull', 'planning-perfect-hull-visit')
